short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will show your fav website in a popup when you click on the extension icon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Favorite Popup is a straightforward and efficient Chrome extension that enhances your browsing experience by providing instant access to your most visited webpage. Tailored for ease and convenience, this tool is perfect for those who regularly access specific online resources, be it for work, study, or personal use.

Key Features:
Instant Access: Open your favorite webpage in a click. Whether it's a news site, a work tool, or a social media platform, Favorite Popup takes you there instantly.
Customizable: Set up the extension with the URL of your choice. It can be a frequently visited website, an internal company portal, or anything else that's part of your daily online routine.
Simple Design: We believe in keeping things simple. Favorite Popup is user-friendly with a clean and straightforward interface.
Efficiency at Your Fingertips: Save time and effort. No more typing URLs or navigating through bookmarks. Your preferred page is just a click away.
Safe and Secure: We respect your privacy. Favorite Popup doesn't track your browsing activity or collect personal information.
Easy Installation:
Getting started with Favorite Popup is quick and easy. Just add it to Chrome, set your desired URL in the options, and you're ready to go. It's that simple!

Permissions:
Storage: To store your URL settings.
All URLs: To enable the popup to display your chosen webpage.

Your feedback is invaluable. If you have suggestions, questions, or need assistance, don't hesitate to reach out.
